description: Domain for tracking/modifying Web Animations, as well as CSS (declarative) animations and transitions.

properties.name: animationName
properties.description: Equal to the corresponding `animation-name` CSS property. Should not be provided if `transitionProperty` is also provided.

properties.name: transitionProperty
properties.description: Equal to the corresponding `transition-property` CSS property. Should not be provided if `animationName` is also provided.

commands.name: startTracking
commands.description: Start tracking animations. This will produce a `trackingStart` event.

commands.name: stopTracking
commands.description: Stop tracking animations. This will produce a `trackingComplete` event.

events.name: trackingUpdate
events.description: Fired for each phase of Web Animation.
